top_comments.comment: Want THREE (3) Masters booster boxes (2015, 2017, and Ultimate)? It's the Triple Masters giveaway! But there's also 45 additional MTG prizes going out to 45 additional donors! You can see the full list here: https://twitter.com/TolarianCollege/status/1454226004130426884?s=20 and you just need to donate in $4 multiples. Each $4 is another chance to get a cool prize! Donate---> https://secure.givelively.org/donate/trans-lifeline/tolarian-community-college-1
But seriously, Entwine? Why is that even pretending to be not Kicker?
He’s out of line, but he’s right.
